result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel P Kennedy

records.addlTxt:
Court ordered no contact with RAS
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3. Court ordered Defendant provide updated address to the court and Justice Point.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Daniel P Kennedy appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Zoey Stefaniak appeared by video for Daniel P Kennedy.  Attorney Kylan Reilly appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Daniel P Kennedy not in court. 
The Milwaukee County Sheriff's Office has cleared the active warrant, provided the next court date to the defendant, and requested the warrant be withdrawn with approval of Deputy Chief Judge Carl Ashley. MCSO advised defendant to appear in Room 221 of the Safety Building, in person, at 1:00 PM on 11-08-2022.
Return on warrant/Initial appearance scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
